model <- lm(value ~ graph_type + vulnlabels, data = results)

summary(model)
confint(model, level=0.95)

anova(model)

library(emmeans)

emm <- emmeans(model, pairwise ~ graph_type)

summary(emm)


results$residuals <- residuals(model)
results$fitted_values <- fitted(model)

par(mfrow= c(2,2))
plot(model)
par(mfrow = c(1,1))


plot(results$fitted_values, results$residuals,
     xlab = "Fitted Values",
     ylab = "Residuals", 
     main = "Residuals vs Fitted Values")
abline(h=0, col="red", lty=2)

plot(residuals(model) ~ results$graph_type)
plot(residuals(model) ~ results$vulnlabels)


numeric_cols <- sapply(df, is.numeric)
variances <- sapply(results[, numeric_cols], var)
